span.span: An abstract class that provides a base for all inline flow content elements.

The default value is .**Baseline**.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };
member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 元素中内容流的相对方向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 枚举的一个成员，它指定相对流动方向。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the relative flow direction.

value.span: 获取此属性将返回当前有效的流动方向。

span.span: Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction.

value.span: 设置此属性将导致 元素的内容重新沿指示的方向流动。

span.span: Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容的流动方向通常对应于所表示语言的原始流方向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯来语和阿拉伯语提供自然从右到左的语言的示例。Hebrew and Arabic provide examples of languages that naturally flow from right-to-left. 英语、德语和俄语提供了从左到右自然流动的语言的示例。English, German, and Russian provide examples of languages that naturally flow from left-to-right. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的值不会自动更改，与操作系统所使用的语言相匹配。The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果需要使用不同的值，则默认值为 ，则必须自行指定。If you need to use a different value then the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 () 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Inline_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_inline_flowdirectionxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_flowdirection)]

summary.span: 获取与此元素对等的下一个 元素。

span.span: Gets the next element that is a peer to this element.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示与 此元素对等的下一个元素; 如果没有下一个元素，则 **为 null** 。

span.span: An object representing the next element that is a peer to this element, or **null** if there is no next element.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. summary.span: 获取与此元素对等的上一个 元素。

span.span: Gets the previous element that is a peer to this element.

value.span: 表示与 此元素对等的上一个元素的对象; 如果没有上一个元素，则**为 null** 。

span.span: An object representing the previous element that is a peer to this element, or **null** if there is no previous element.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SiblingInlines As InlineCollection

summary.span: 获取一个 ，它包含与此元素同级（对等）的 元素。

span.span: Gets an that contains the elements that are siblings (peers) to this element.

value.span: 一个 对象，它包含与此元素同级的 元素。

span.span: An object that contains the elements that are siblings to this element.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的集合始终包含请求集合所使用的元素。The collection returned by this property always contains the element through which the collection is requested. 也就是说，内联元素被视为自己的同级，目的是为元素生成同级的集合。That is, an inline element is considered to be its own sibling for the purpose of building a collection of siblings for the element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_SiblingBase](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_siblingbase)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_SiblingBase](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_siblingbase)] [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_Siblings](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_siblings)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_Siblings](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_siblings)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ TextDecorations { System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ value); };
member this.TextDecorations : System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection with get, set

summary.span: 获取一个 ，它包含要应用于此元素的文本修饰。

span.span: Gets a that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 一个 集合，它包含应用于此元素的文本修饰。

span.span: A collection that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 默认值为 **null** (未) 应用任何文本修饰。

span.span: The default value is **null** (no text decorations applied).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是可添加到文本的视觉对象装饰。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四种类型的文本修饰：下划线、基线、删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 有关文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：创建文本修饰](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 () 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_inline_textdecxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照：具有默认删除线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "屏幕快照：具有默认删除线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下图显示了上 **划线**、 **基线**和 **下划线** 修饰的分别呈现方式。The following figures show how the **Overline**, **Baseline**, and **Underline** decorations render, respectively. ![屏幕快照：上划线 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "屏幕快照：上划线 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![屏幕快照：文本上的默认基线效果](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "屏幕快照：文本上的默认基线效果")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![屏幕快照：具有默认下划线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "屏幕快照：具有默认下划线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect") 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_textdec)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_textdec)]
